3 Let’s try it! Question: Have you been hearing all of the news about corduroy pillows? Answer: They’re making head lines! Question: How was this plot made? Answer: sim_data <- data.frame(x = rnorm(100)) sim_data$y <- rnorm(100, mean = sim_data$x + 1) plot(y ~ x, sim_data)
